ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon heard and nodded, then gasped. Why would BrightBlade not want to be his partner anymore? Gangon ran after BrightBlade. He caught up to her. Wait! Why

Gangon heard and nodded, then gasped. Why would BrightBlade not want to be
his partner anymore? Gangon ran after BrightBlade. He caught up to her.
"Wait! Why don't you want to be my partner anymore?" Gangon said. Lightmare
came up and sighed. "You like that Brightthing too much, don't you? Well,
tell you what, i'll tag along with your friend if you still want her to be
your partner!" Lightmare said. Gangon growled at Lightmare. "BrightBlade, I
never want to leave you, your the only reason I don't even obey Hell Beast
any more! You have that affect on me baby, your great!" Gangon said. "What?"
Lightmare said disgustingly. Gangon looked at Lightmare. "Your still welcome
to come with us though." Gangon said. "What?" Lightmare said. "I'm sure you
need a partner, Lightmare, now you can have two!" Gangon said. "WHAT?"
Lightmare said. She figured that Gangon would leave BrightBlade if it meant
coming with her. Lightmare walked with BrightBlade and gangon with an angry
look on her face. Lightmare was thinking up plans on how to get rid of
BrightBlade...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 05, 2000 8:35 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * BrightBlade whined a bit as she pressed her hurt foot against the
ground,
> walking hurt but as long as it got her away from that hussy she really
> didn't give a nano!
> She looked back quickly over her shoulder to see if Gangon was following
and
> saw Lightmare kiss him again, obviously he had made his choice and had
> chosen the new bot as his new partner.
> She then looked ahead again and continued to limp towards the base, if he
> wanted her then that was just fine with her...sort of.
> BrightBlade liked Gangon as her partner, of course he acted funny
sometimes
> but that was just the way he was...it even made her laugh at times too.
She
> admitted that she would miss him and his comments on her looks but she
> couldn't compete with a bot who literally threw herself in his arms, a
male
> couldn't resist that...most.
> She had lost even without trying, but she wasn't about to admit it. That
> just wasn't her way of doing things. She would brood about it on her own
> time, as she had about other things that had caused her to become
stressed.
> BrightBlade then opened her com-link to Gangon.*
>
> " I'll just leave you and...your new partner to your...amusements. See ya
> back at base."
>
> * The last sentence was a bit bitter and harsh but she really didn't care,
> as long as she was understood.
> She then walked away from the direct approach towards the base and soon
> began to take the longer way, a way that would give her enough time to
> think.And a way that would give her great distance from the...pair.*
>
